thread.title: Broncos Ellis In Houston, Meets With His Uncle George
thread.title_full: Broncos Ellis In Houston, Meets With His Uncle George

author: Sports – CBS Denver
title: Broncos Ellis In Houston, Meets With His Uncle George
text:
Broncos Ellis In Houston, Meets With His Uncle George February 3, 2017 3:32 PM 
HOUSTON (CBS4) – Did you know the Broncos president is related to another president? 
Two of them, actually. 
Broncos president Joe Ellis is the nephew of former President George H.W. Bush, which also makes him the cousin of former President George W. Bush. Broncos President Joe Ellis with his Uncle George from Houston who will toss the coin Sunday prior to #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/2GbUfnpEG5 
— Greg Aiello (@gregaiello) February 3, 2017 
Ellis is in Houston this weekend for the Super Bowl, where Bush 41 will conduct the game’s coin toss with former First Lady Barbara Bush. 
George H.W. and Barbara were both recently released from the hospital, where they each spent several days due to treatment for pneumonia and bronchitis, respectively.
